column2: Chamath Palihapitiya, the outspoken venture capitalist and SPAC front man, will depart Virgin Galactic Chairman immediately.
column4: Chamath Palihapitiya Steps Down As Virgin Galactic Holdings Chairman

column2: U.S. financial markets will be closed on Monday in observance of Presidents Day, or Washington’s Birthday, if you prefer. The Intercontinental Exchange Inc. (ICE) -owned New York Stock Exchange and the Nasdaq (NDAQ) will be closed on Feb. 21.
column4: Presidents Day or Washington’s Birthday? Is the U.S. stock market open? Here are trading hours.
